notes.text:
This update for expat fixes the following issues:

- Fixed a regression caused by the patch for CVE-2022-25236 (bsc#1196784).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: xmlparse.c in Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5 allows attackers to insert namespace-separator characters into namespace URIs.
notes.title: CVE description
